name: sort(x,y,z) by >=
description: The program should sort the values bound to x, y and z in descending order. Predicate perm(a,b) means that the list a is a permutation of the list b.
precondition: x, y, z = X, Y, Z

shorthands.name: perm
shorthands.definition: a,b,c = A,B,C || a,b,c = A,C,B || a,b,c = B,A,C || a,b,c = B,C,A || a,b,c = C,A,B || a,b,c = C,B,A
